readable.title: 2913207978_9e9624e249
readable.content: An Asian woman holding a fan watches traffic go by . An Asian woman in a misspelled t-shirt fans herself in the mid-afternoon sun while waiting for a bus in the city . A woman in a white shirt standing beside a road fanning herself . A woman waits at the side of a busy road holding a fan . A woman with a fan near the street .
